name: eevium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows eevee to upgrade last resort into extreme evoboost.
short_effect: Held: Allows Eevee to upgrade Last Resort into Extreme Evoboost.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eevee’s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eevee’s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades Eevee’s Last Resort to a Z-Move.
